attributes.action: Declare UK state of emergency and pass brexit over to Cobra task force team.
attributes.additional_details:
The people's time, trust and tax payers money has been wasted due to in fighting in the government.

Ministers interested in bettering their careers have taken advantage of the discord in the brexit process.

This shows the government as a whole is not capable in acting as one in the interests of the UK.

An emergence group / task force is required to steer the UK for the near future until stability after brexit is attained.
attributes.background:
An emergence group / task force is required to steer the UK for the near future until stability after brexit is attained.

Flaws of the UK government are highlighted indicating a total overhaul is required to bring it up to date with the modern times.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You can find out more about the current emergency planning laws here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/preparation-and-planning-for-emergencies-responsibilities-of-responder-agencies-and-others
